content:
**EXISTING STRUCTURES**

### Electricity Generator at Position (x1)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position (x2)
- Boiler at position (x3)
- Offshore Pump at position (x4)

### Copper Plate Mine at Position (x5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x6) and a Furnace at position (y6)
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x7) and a Furnace at position (y7)
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x8) and a Furnace at position (y8)

### Copper Cable Factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x9) and a Furnace at position (y9)
- Assembling Machine at position (z1) and Inserter at position (a1) that puts into Assembling Machine
- Beltgroup (position b1) that connects the Furnace at position (y9) to Assembling Machine at position (z1)

**ERROR TIPS**

### Errors when Using Extracting but Being Too Far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when Placing into a Tile Which is Occupied by Another Entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Incorrect API Usage
- Review the API documentation to ensure correct function calls and parameter usage.

### Misplaced Objects
- Double-check the intended position before placing objects to avoid misplacement.
